overview: HIV Rising digs deeper into the alarming rise of HIV/AIDS cases in the Philippines with award-winning journalist Korina Sanchez-Roxas. The program presents data on the number of people living with HIV/AIDS in the country, and lists ways on how people could transmit and contract the virus. HIVpositive individuals share how they contracted the virus and the discrimination that they get from other people. Members of the public and private sector also talk about the ways in spreading awareness and preventing the spread of the virus.
title: HIV Rising
